alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Noble; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 11:59PM CDT until August 14 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Noble County in northern Oklahoma... Payne County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1158 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Glencoe to 3 miles southeast of Tryon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Cushing, Perkins, Stroud, Yale, Morrison, Carney, Glencoe, Tryon, Ripley, Agra, Kendrick, Fallis, Quay, Avery, Lake Mcmurtry, Ingalls, and Parkland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
